ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectRené Héroux Remission Order
PrecisREMISSION ORDER which remits a portion of the income tax and penalties, and all relevant interest on the tax and penalties in respect of the 1987, 1988 and 1989 taxation years, paid or payable by RENÉ HÉROUX.
